DOC.brief_summary: 1 . To compare hs-TnT level cardiac stress test patient vs. patient without CAD 2 . To assess level post-exercise hs-TnT predicting CAD ( use ROC-analysis ) 3 . To determine sensitivity , specificity accuracy exercise-induced hsTopT level predict CAD , either alone relation traditional patient-related exercise test-related metric
DOC.brief_title: Exercise-induced High-sensitivity Troponin Levels Predictor Obstructive Coronary Artery Disease
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients suspect CAD , plan diagnostic coronary angiogram 2 . Patients previous revascularization , suspect recurrent ischemia 1 . Congestive cardiomyopathy LV EF < 35 % 2 . Renal failure eGFR < 30 ml/min 3 . Known structural severe valvular heart disease 4 . Prior CABG 5 . Previous ACS < 6 week 6 . Known incomplete revascularization previous PCI 7 . Unstable angina ACS ( define unstable anginal symptom + ECG change hsTnT > 0.053 ng/L )
